javascript.title: JavaScript
javascript.description: I love Javascript. It's a fun language, but can be frustrating sometimes.

internet.title: The Internet
internet.description: I love the Internet. Tis' a strange place.

cinema.title: The Cinema
cinema.description: I love going to the cinema. Favorite 3 actors: DiCaprio, Jackman, and Gordon-Levitt. Favorite 3 actresses: Johansson, Blanchett, and Kendrick

netflix.title: Netflix
netflix.description: I love Netflix. Though it's hard to find time to watch it nowadays.

cats.title: Cats
cats.description: I love cats! Dogs come to a close second though.

space.title: Space
space.description: I love space and the universe beyond. They can be stunningly beautiful, but haunting at the same time.

books.title: Books
books.description: I love books. Someone said that if you don't read, you will only live one life. But if you do, you will live a thousand...

games.title: Games
games.description: I love games, especially those with a good story. Also r/pcmasterrace. Bite me.

friends.title: My Friends & Family
friends.description: I love my friends and family. Quite lucky to have them.

website.title: My Very Own Website
website.description: I created my very own website. From scratch. It runs on NodeJS, React, and nights of sleeplessness.

vegas.title: Vegas
vegas.description: I have been to Vegas. It's a very fun city for those with excessive energy and cash.

aca.title: The ACA
aca.description: I have done the ACA. Passed all 15 exams first time. Would not do again.

degree.title: A Degree
degree.description: I got a 2.1 in Economics & Finance from the University of Southampton back in 2013. You know when people say university time is fun and fly by fast, they are not lying.

boat.title: A Boat
boat.description: Let's be honest here. You too also want a boat.

antarctica.title: Visit Antarctica
antarctica.description: I think it's a very cool thing to do.

12 books.title: Read 1 Book a Month
12 books.description: This is one of my resolution. If I succeed, you will find this getting moved from here to the 'Done' category.
